summary: kluster.ai provides the technology to verify and trust AI responses in real time. Developers can validate outputs, detect hallucinations, and ensure response reliability across any model, with minimal integration effort.

source_repos.name: kluster.ai cookbook
source_repos.description: This repository is a collection of guides and examples designed to help developers unlock the full potential of kluster.ai.

source_repos.name: Verify Guardrail Validator
source_repos.description: This validator detects hallucinations in AI-generated content using kluster.ai's Code Reviews. The service can evaluate the AI response based on a given context, which makes it great for RAG applications. Without providing a specific context, the service can also be used as a real-time reliability verification service. Verify is able to identify when AI responses contain fabricated or inaccurate information.
